Text:
OK; in short:  
World War 3 will start 1. Feb 2006 ??  (I guess this hidden code is not quite as reliable as the author claims it to be...? ) Or, - if he is right, take up some huge loans and spend all the money before 13th of August 2009! Then look for Jesus until 28th September 2009, and then .......... THE END .

This has been conclusively proven to be nothing but a posteriori junk: The same techniques applied to any sufficiently long text yield similar results. Notice that there are no predictions, but post-dictions. In a word, worthless.
